column3: There was no eating facilities only a small market agoining the hotel.
column4: The windows could not be opened for fresh air. If one cooked in the room the smell would stay for days

column3: It is an upscale dormitory with studios with kitchens. Excellent gastropub and the supermarket in the building.
column4: The gyms equipment is ridiculous and it has no ventilation !

column3: Easy check-in and check-out without contact people. The personnel gave me clear instructions what I need to do. There are a lot of things to do there to spend of the free time.
Clean, convenient location for a work visit to the hospital
column4: Atmosphere was a bit odd with the students living there. Didn't feel like a hotel.

column3: Close to Hospital and airport. Grocery store downstairs.

column4: Not much places where to eat out
